Tools for managing standalone files from Github.

Source: R/utils-standalone.R
utils-standalone.Rd

Tools for managing standalone files from Github.

Usage

standalone_urls(repo, sort = TRUE)

standalone_choices(repo, sprt = TRUE)

standalone_select(nm, repo, use_grep = TRUE, sort = TRUE, simplify = TRUE)

standalone_get(
  repo,
  nm = ".",
  dest_dir = "code/standalone",
  ...,
  use_grep = TRUE,
  sort = TRUE,
  simplify = TRUE
)

choose_standalones(
  repo,
  dest_dir = "R",
  multiple = TRUE,
  ...,
  use_grep = TRUE,
  sort = TRUE,
  simplify = TRUE
)

local_standalones(dir, pattern = "standalone-", full_path = FALSE)

standalone_info(
  repo,
  nm = NULL,
  use_grep = TRUE,
  sort = FALSE,
  simplify = TRUE
)

# S3 method for class 'standalone_info'
print(x)
